sentence: There's a lack of food here - it's my boyfriend's fault!

sentence: They all approve of my good performance.

sentence: Many relics from the ancient Egyptian civilisation have been discovered.

sentence: When you bake bread, the heat and the yeast make it swell over the top of the pan.
sentence_tra: 烤面包时，热量和酵母会让面包膨胀出盘外。

mean_cn: n. 团;  肿块;  大量;  粗笨的人;  vi. 成团, 成堆;  adj. 成团的;  整个儿的;  vt. 使成块;  使团结在一起;  把…混在一起;

mean_cn: n. 【化学】酸;  酸性物质;  尖酸;  adj. 酸味的;   尖刻的;  敏锐的;  含酸过多的;  酸的;

sentence_tra: 确保不要去碰酸，它会灼伤你的。

sentence: Could you check my spelling of that word?

sentence: My mom instructs me how to play golf.

mean_cn: adj.安心的；安全的v.使安全；保卫；确保

mean_cn: v.解雇；关闭；停止活动n.(临时)解雇期

sentence_tra: 我恐怕你的工作不是很好，所以我不得不解雇你。

mean_cn: v. 使生灵感；启示；激发

sentence: The Union Jack is the flag of the United Kingdom.
sentence_tra: 米字旗是大英帝国的国旗。

mean_cn: n.感谢，感激；正确评价；欣赏，增值

mean_cn: n.分配，委派；任务，(课外)作业

sentence: I used an eraser to make corrections to my homework.

sentence: I hope the saying "No pain, no gain" isn't true.

mean_cn: n. 收受人, 尤指收款员;  听筒;

mean_cn: adj. 温暖的; 味淡的; 轻微的;

mean_cn: n. 家伙, 男人;  同伴;  adj. 同事的, 同伴的;  处于相同情况的, 同类的;  vt. 使…与另一个对等, 使…与另一个匹敌;

sentence_tra: 那两个家伙在庆祝他们的成功。

sentence: I could see the boy's shadow on the ground as he played soccer.

sentence: Letters used to be carried over oceans by ship, but now everything goes by airmail.

mean_cn: adv. 向后;  倒, 逆;  往回;

sentence: My childhood was a happy and innocent time - I was lucky.

mean_cn: n. 图表，表格v. 制成图表

sentence: The first trains were powered by steam.
sentence_tra: 第一辆火车是蒸汽驱动的。

sentence: Ever since I broke my jaw, I can only drink through a straw.
sentence_tra: 自从我摔坏了下巴，就只能用吸管喝了。

mean_cn: n: 学者;  adj: (综合大学中的)学院的, 学术的;
sentence: Academic jobs are not always well paid, but they're very satisfying.
sentence_tra: 虽然学术工作收入不高，但是让人很满足。

mean_cn: n. 紧急情况，突发事件
sentence: It's an emergency: get her to the hospital as soon as possible.
sentence_tra: 情况紧急，尽快送她去医院。

mean_cn: n.脚后跟，（鞋）后跟v.给(鞋)钉后掌；紧跟
sentence: Shoes with high heels look sexy.
sentence_tra: 高跟鞋看起来很性感。

mean_cn: n. 爪;  (某些节肢动物的), 钳;  vi. 抓, 挖;  vt. 抓, 挖;
sentence: You have to watch out for the crab's claws.
sentence_tra: 你一定要小心螃蟹的钳。

sentence: The sun's glare made it hard to see.
sentence_tra: 太阳强烈的光线让人无法直视。

sentence: Our class raised money to buy a new bench for the park.
sentence_tra: 我们班筹钱给公园买了个新长凳。

mean_cn: n. 面部按摩, 美容;  adj. 表面的, 面部的;
sentence: Facials help keep her skin looking great.
sentence_tra: 美容能帮助她保持皮肤看起来光滑细嫩的状态。

mean_cn: n.残疾；无能；无资格；不利条件
sentence: Even though the boy has a disability, he still enjoys making art with his dog.
sentence_tra: 尽管这个男孩儿有残疾，但是他仍然乐于和他的狗一起搞艺术创作。

mean_cn: adj.年长的；资格老的，地位较高的n.(大学或高中)毕业生
sentence: Senior citizens should be respected.
sentence_tra: 年长的人应该被尊重。

sentence: People with mental health problems can go to a psychologist for help.
sentence_tra: 有精神健康问题的人们可以去心理医生那里寻求帮助。

sentence: A helpful librarian can make your research much easier.
sentence_tra: 一个称职的图书管理员能让你更容易地做研究。

sentence: She was a gifted musician, even as a little girl.
sentence_tra: 她是个有天赋的音乐家，即使她是个小女孩。

mean_cn: n.可能，可能性；可能的事，希望
sentence: There's a possibility I'm right; then again, I might be wrong.
sentence_tra: 有可能我是对的，当然也有可能我是错的。

mean_cn: adj.锋利的；敏锐的；清晰的adv. 急剧地；锐利地；突然地
sentence: The sharp knife can cut through steak.
sentence_tra: 这把锋利的刀能切断牛排。

sentence: Thank you so much; I'm very grateful for your gift.
sentence_tra: 太谢谢啦！非常感谢你的礼物！

sentence: Ok, we're guilty - just please don't kill us!
sentence_tra: 好吧，我们有罪。请不要杀我们。

sentence: Biology is the study of life.
sentence_tra: 生物学是对生命的研究。

sentence: "I wish he loved me," she said as she sighed with disappointment.
sentence_tra: “我希望他爱我。”她哀叹道。

sentence: Show your strength! Hit it again!
sentence_tra: 展示出你的力量！再来一击！

sentence: Some parrots can talk just like a person.
sentence_tra: 有些鹦鹉可以像人一样说话。

sentence: The hands tear the wall wide open.
sentence_tra: 一双手撕裂了这面墙。

sentence: This space satellite transmits TV signals to earth.
sentence_tra: 这颗人造卫星把电视信号传输到地球。

sentence: Stop making so many revisions to my book--you're ruining it!
sentence_tra: 不要再在我的书上做那么多修改了！你在摧残它！

sentence: Santa is famous for his big white beard.
sentence_tra: 圣诞老人因他的白色大胡子而出名。

mean_cn: adj. 部分时间的; 兼职的;  adv. 以部分时间; 作为兼职;
sentence: During the day I go to school; at night, I work part-time as a waiter.
sentence_tra: 白天我去学校；晚上，我兼职做服务员。

sentence: She is a good housewife. She always stays home to cook and clean.
sentence_tra: 她是个优秀的家庭主妇。她总是呆在家里做饭打扫。

mean_cn: n.制服，军服adj.相同的，一律的
sentence: The nurses at the hospital really like their new uniforms.
sentence_tra: 医院的护士们都很喜欢她们的新制服。

mean_cn: n. 出血;  vi. 流血;  感到疼痛, 同情;  vt. 使流血;  使...排出液体;
sentence: My nose bleeds whenever I see hunks.
sentence_tra: 我看到帅哥就会流鼻血。

mean_cn: n. 文件夹, 档案;  文件;  vi. 把文件归档;  vt. 把(文件等)归档;
sentence: You can find the answer in one of these files.
sentence_tra: 你可以在其中一份文件里找到答案。

mean_cn: n. 满足, 满意;  乐事;  补偿;
sentence: They had enormous satisfaction in their marriage, even after 50 years.
sentence_tra: 即便是结婚50年后，他们对婚姻生活也很满足。

sentence: The happy couple hugs in front of their new house.
sentence_tra: 这对开心的夫妇相拥在他们的新房子前。

sentence: I hope I don't have worry lines on my forehead.
sentence_tra: 我希望前额别长皱纹。

sentence: Please don't chew and speak at the same time.
sentence_tra: 请不要边吃边说话。

sentence: Having a passport is a requirement if you want to go to another country.
sentence_tra: 如果你想去其他国家，护照是必须的。

sentence: This squirrel is trying to remember where he hid the nuts.
sentence_tra: 这只松鼠正试着回想他把坚果藏哪儿了。

sentence: The two dogs are a lot alike.
sentence_tra: 这两只狗长得很像。

sentence: My teeth feel great after an oral cleaning.
sentence_tra: 口腔清洁后我的牙齿感觉超棒。

mean_cn: n.学者；公费生，有奖学金的学生
sentence: She's so young, but she's quite the little scholar.
sentence_tra: 她很小，但是已经是一个小小的学者啦。

mean_cn: n. 闪电;  意外的好运;  vi. 闪电;  adj. 闪电的, 闪电般的, 迅速的;
sentence: There was a lot of lightning during the storm last night.
sentence_tra: 昨晚风暴来袭时电闪雷鸣。

sentence: I'll confirm that I want to buy this shirt online.
sentence_tra: 我会确认我想在网上买这件衬衫。

sentence: The fortune teller predicts her customer's future.
sentence_tra: 塔罗牌大师预测她的客户的未来。

sentence: If you sow the seeds now, next year we'll have some nice plants.
sentence_tra: 如果现在播下种子，明年我们就能有许多漂亮的植物了。

mean_cn: adj. 整洁的;  灵巧的;  纯的;  不掺水的;
sentence: My dog cleaned my house and made it very neat.
sentence_tra: 我的狗打扫了我的房子让房间（看起来）很整齐。
